```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
devtools::load_all()
```

data(wc.volumes)

wc.data.path = system.file("extdata/willowcreek/WillowCreek_2013_2019.xlsx",
  package = "rremat")

wc.data = read_excel(wc.data.path, range = "D6:J22714", na = "NaN") %>%
  select(date, wse = 4, ta = 3, oa = 5, sa = 7) %>%
  mutate(wse = round(wse, 0.1)) %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  left_join(wc.volumes, by = "wse")

usethis::use_data(wc.data)
